name: String of Beaded Bubbles
rules: As this item enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost or nature.;On your turn: Pay 2-> Your hero deals 1 damage of the chosen type to target hero or ally.

name: Pendant of Quiet Breath
rules: At the end of your turn, if your hero didn't attack this turn, add a tactics counter to this item.;Your hero has Assault 1 for each tactics counter.

name: Celadon Pendant
rules: Your hero has Mend 1 for each face-up resource you control.

name: Amulet of Dull Dreaming
rules: At the start of your turn, you may put a resource you control into your hand.

name: Band of Bees
rules: Your hero has Protector.;When your hero protects, you may put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Bee ally token into play.
flavour: Even the smallest of nature's creatures can cause quite a stir. - Kanga the Primal

name: Band of Secret Names
rules: When this item enters play, remove the top card of target opponent's deck from the game. Then, search his deck for cards with that name and remove them from the game.;When this item leaves play, shuffle each card removed this way into its owner's deck.

name: Ring of the Battle Anthem
rules: 2 -> Allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.;;Stash: Target ally has Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: Sound the drums of war! - Jamus'Var

name: Twined Band of Flowers
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Your hero heals 1 damage from each ally you control and has Assault 1 this turn for each damage healed this way.
flavour: Never hesitate to end your enemies, or they come back even strongest than before. - Faldren Tilsdale

name: Bedrock Talisman
rules: You pay 1 less to play this item for each 5 damage on your hero.;Allies you control have Protector

name: Core of Ripeness
rules: When this item enters play, reveal the top two cards of your deck, then place them into your resource row exhausted as additional resources.;When this item leaves play, destroy three resources you control.

name: Fluid Death
rules: When an ally you control deals combat damage to a hero, add a depth counter to this item.;Your hero has Assault 1 for each depth counter on this item.

name: Soul Casket
rules: [Exhaust], Discard an ally -> Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
